detectors.description: Pond.getRandomSnakeOwner() (contracts/pond.sol#316-322) uses a weak PRNG: stakedIdToStaker[snakesStaked[random]] (contracts/pond.sol#320)
Pond._claimById(uint256,bool) (contracts/pond.sol#99-166) uses a weak PRNG: stealRoll < 5000 (contracts/pond.sol#146)

Pond._rand() (contracts/pond.sol#311-313) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender,block.timestamp,block.difficulty,block.timestamp,entropySauce))) (contracts/pond.sol#312)
